title:
Is Lowe\'s Home Improvement still planning to build in the Waterford Center?



Is Lowe\'s Grocery still planning to build in Brunswick Forest, if so, when?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. Lowes Foods: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=6594 Lowe's Home Improvement: http://www.myreporter.com/?p=4687 Obviously we'll need to update both of those soon. I'll send you updated links when that happens.
